name: Touhou - Incomplete Fruition of Changing Wish
name_original: Touhou - Incomplete Fruition of Changing Wish
description:
"My wish... is to let everyone be comfortable on their own body... so no one has to go through the same pain as me."

Touhou Incomplete Fruition of Changing Wish is a bullet hell game made for the Touhou Pride Game Jam #3, a game jam that took 15 days, from June 1st until June 15th, themed after LGBTQIA+ Pride.

The story starts when someone makes a wish to Belle Nagareboshi, to make everyone have their true gender. Since this wish is a big one, Belle Nagareboshi took a while to make it come true, leaving everyone with constantly changing gender while she was working on it. Toyosatomimi no Miko is displeased about this, because the entire reason she became a taoist was to become a shikaisen, and finally have a body that matched their gender. So she, and their partner, Byakuren Hijiri, rush to find who's causing this incident, and make everything return to normal.

Credits:

Slowbro - Composer
